text:
Gully Boy Trailer Is Out, Countdown Begins For Game Of Thrones Final Season & More From Ent
Gully Boy Trailer Is Out, Countdown Begins For Game Of Thrones Final Season & More From Ent
It’s now officially the year that Game of Thrones comes back. — HBO (@HBO) January 1, 2019
#1 HBO CEO Richard Plepler has watched all the episodes of Game of Thrones season 8, and he says they will be like six epic films.
Fans have been waiting for the third instalment for the longest time, and finally, the good news has arrived. The script for Munna Bhai 3 is ready, and Arshad Warsi has confirmed that the shooting will start this year.
The third film that will feature a character based on Prime Minister Narendra Modi is Uri: The Surgical Strike – that stars Vicky Kaushal in the lead role and is releasing on Jan 11.
Even as artistes and singers in the state came out on the streets during the “Assam bandh” to protest against the bill, Garg posted an emotional letter addressed to Sonowal on social media along with a photograph of himself holding the letter.
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES
Both Alia Bhatt and Ranveer Singh look endearing and convincing in their roles as they tell their story of rags to riches and making it big in the city of dreams-Mumbai. In his rapper avatar, Ranveer Singh's portrayal again proves that he can easily slip in, into the skin of all his characters.
title: Gully Boy Trailer Is Here, Countdown Begins For GOT Final Season & More From Ent.
